26.2. [Heiric of Auxerre] Homilarius super euangelium.
Homily | Gospels
Manuscripts:
1. Bamberg, Staatsbibliothek Patr. 46 (Q.VI.32), f. 41-45. saec. ix-x. Homiliae III.
2. Berlin, Staatsbibliothek - Preussischer Staatsbibliothek theol. lat. fol. 146 (elect. 352). saec. xv. Attributed to Haimo.
3. Graz, Universitätsbibliothek 617. saec. xv; Neuberg. Pars aestiva.
4. Leningrad, F.v.I,19. saec. xii; Leiden. Pars aestiva. Attributed to Heiric.
5. Melk 193 (F. 34). saec. xiii mid. Pars hiemalis. Attributed to Heiric.
6. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek clm 9504. saec. xii; Oberaltaich.
7. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek clm 16207. saec. xiv; Passau, St. Nicolas. Pars hiemalis. Attributed to Heiric.
8. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek clm 18239 (Tegernsee 239). saec. xv.
9. Oxford, Bodleian Library Laud. Misc. 493 [1205]. f. 64-67v: saec. xiii. Heiric of Auxerre. Sermon, Beata paupertas vera intellegitur humilitas.
10. Paris, Bibliothèque Mazarine 698 (183). saec. ix-x. Saint-Victor. 157 ff. Abbreviated version.
11. Paris, Bibiothèque nationale de France lat. 2451 (Rigault 482; Dupuy 514; Regius 3817). saec. x. 117 ff. Abbreviated version. Attributed to Remigius.
12. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat 14302. saec. xii. Attributed to Alcuin; text based on Maz. 698.
13. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France n.a.l. 464. saec. xii. Barré d. 14. Reims, Bibliothèque municipale 1406, f. 112-176v. saec. xi: St. Thierry. Pars hiemalis.
15. Toronto, Bergendal 50 (Phillipps 6653/21631). saec. x; France, Tours ? Pars aestiva. 16. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 1236. saec. xiii. Pars hiemalis. Attributed to Bede.
17. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 2460 (38.8 Aug.), f. 20-166. saec. xv; Braunschweig, St. Blasius.
